List all coins in the wallet with optional filtering and pagination.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the get_coins endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"List coins with filtering and pagination","required":["offset","limit"],"properties":{"ascending":{"type":"boolean","description":"Sort in ascending order","default":false},"asset_id":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Optional asset ID to filter by"},"filter_mode":{"description":"Filter mode","type":"string","enum":["all","selectable","owned","spent","clawback"],"title":"CoinFilterMode"},"limit":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Number of coins to return","example":50,"minimum":0},"offset":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Starting offset for pagination","example":0,"minimum":0},"sort_mode":{"description":"Sort mode","type":"string","enum":["coin_id","amount","created_height","spent_height","clawback_timestamp"],"title":"CoinSortMode"}},"title":"GetCoins"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_coins","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with coin list","required":["coins","total"],"properties":{"coins":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["coin_id","address","amount"],"properties":{"address":{"type":"string"},"amount":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0}],"title":"Amount"},"clawback_timestamp":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","minimum":0},"coin_id":{"type":"string"},"created_height":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int32","minimum":0},"created_timestamp":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","minimum":0},"offer_id":{"type":["string","null"]},"spent_height":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int32","minimum":0},"spent_timestamp":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","minimum":0},"transaction_id":{"type":["string","null"]}},"title":"CoinRecord"},"description":"List of coins"},"total":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Total number of coins available","minimum":0}},"title":"GetCoinsResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
